ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  function spArr(arr, num) {
    let newArr = []
	   for (let i = 0; i < arr.length;) {
		    newArr.push(arr.slice(i, i += num));
    }
	   return newArr
  }
  let array = []
    let v = []
  let res = JSON.parse(result)
  let item_list = spArr(res.data.allItemIds,100)
  let page = item_list.length;
  for(i=0;i<page;i++) {
    let response = java.ajax('https://api5-normal-lq.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/directory/all_infos/v/?item_ids=' + item_list[i] + '&iid=2718442795830583&aid=1967&version_code=290');
    let data=JSON.parse(response).data;
    data.forEach((x)=>{    	if(JSON.stringify(v).indexOf(x.volume_name)==-1){
    	array.push({
    		name:'📖['+x.volume_name+']📖',
    		isVolume:true
    		});
    				
    			 v.push(x.volume_name)
    			 }
          array.push({
            name: x.title,
            url:'https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/reader/full/v1/?group_id=' + x.item_id+'&item_id='+x.item_id+'&aid=1977'
      })
    })
  }
  array
</js>

<js>su = source.getKey()
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
}

result
</js>dl.B

@js:url = source.getKey()
html = java.ajax(url)
act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('form[name~=earch] input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')
url += "sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

re=java.post(url,body,{})
ck=re.header("Set-Cookie")
cookie.replaceCookie(url,ck)
rr=re.header("Location")
reurl=url+rr

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  function spArr(arr, num) {
    let newArr = []
	   for (let i = 0; i < arr.length;) {
		    newArr.push(arr.slice(i, i += num));
    }
	   return newArr
  }
  let array = []
    let v = []
  let res = JSON.parse(result)
  let item_list = spArr(res.data.allItemIds,100)
  let page = item_list.length;
  for(i=0;i<page;i++) {
    let response = java.ajax('https://api5-normal-lq.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/directory/all_infos/v/?item_ids=' + item_list[i] + '&iid=2718442795830583&aid=1967&version_code=290');
    let data=JSON.parse(response).data;
    data.forEach((x)=>{    	if(JSON.stringify(v).indexOf(x.volume_name)==-1){
    	array.push({
    		isVolume:true
    		});
    				
    			 v.push(x.volume_name)
    			 }
          array.push({
            name: x.title,
            url:'https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/reader/full/v1/?group_id=' + x.item_id+'&item_id='+x.item_id+'&aid=1977'
      })
    })
  }
  array

免费小说之王，小米官方全新打造移动阅读平台，实现全站小说正版永久性免费阅读。都市喧嚣，茫茫书海，愿免费小说之王可以陪伴您走过一个又一个充实的日子。在这里，海量红文、精细分类、不占空间、排版精致，我们一起，让阅读成为习惯，成为信仰。

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if (/内容正在载入/.test(src)) {
    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;
</js>div.TxtContent@html||div#content@html##\"|\.

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>su = source.getKey()
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
}

result
</js>dl.B

searchUrl:
@js:url = source.getKey()
html = java.ajax(url)
act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('form[name~=earch] input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')
url += "sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

re=java.post(url,body,{})
ck=re.header("Set-Cookie")
cookie.replaceCookie(url,ck)
rr=re.header("Location")
reurl=url+rr

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
$ = (a) => doc.select(a)
if (/function S2H/.test(result)) {
	function S2H(s){
        var r = [];
        for(var i=0;i<s.length/2;i++){
            r[r.length]= parseInt(s.substr(i*2,2), 16);
        }
        return r;
    }
    var str = S2H(String($('str').html()).replace(/\s/ig,''));
    var key = S2H(String(cookie.getKey(source.getKey(),'key')));
    var x = 0, ret = "";
    for(var i=0;i<str.length;i++){
        var d = (str[i] + key[x]);
        if(d>255)d=d%255;
        ret+='%'+('0'+d.toString(16)).substr(-2,2);
        x++; if(x>=key.length) x=0;
    }
    var html = decodeURIComponent(decodeURI(ret));
    $('str').html(html);
}
doc</js>
html:has(meta[property="og:type"])||ul:has(li.col-md-4.col-sm-8.col-xs-8:has(a))

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if (/内容正在载入/.test(src)) {
    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;
</js>div.TxtContent@html||div#content@html##\"|\.

ruleSearch.author: dd.1@span.0@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>su = source.getKey()
baseUrl = baseUrl.replace(/=$/, "")
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	try {
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
} catch(e) {result = ""} java.deleteFile(img)
}

result
</js>dl.B
ruleSearch.name: dt.0@text

searchUrl:
@js:url = source.getKey()
html = java.ajax(url)
act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('form[name~=earch] input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')
url += "sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

re=java.post(url,body,{})
ck=re.header("Set-Cookie")
cookie.replaceCookie(url,ck)
rr=re.header("Location")
reurl=url+rr

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
page = java.getElement("@@class.last_page");
data = page.attr("href");

ys = data.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1];

list = [({ text: "第1页", href: baseUrl })];

if (ys !== null) {
  for (i = 2; i <= ys; i++) {
    list.push({ text: "第" + i + "页", href: baseUrl.replace(/page=1/, "page=" + i) });
  }
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//本地解密标志位
DEBUG = 0

{{source.bookSourceComment}}

// origin 
origin = source.getVariable()

// aes keys auto update
chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/)
if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) {
  cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1]))
}

// img_array
imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src)
.select(".content-img").toArray()
.map(v=>v.attr("data-r-src"))

if (DEBUG) imgs.splice(1)

imgs.toImg(null,
{headers:{origin:origin}}
	)

<js>
if (/内容正在载入/.test(src)) {
    c2 = src.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = src.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(source.getKey() + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2))
    h = java.ajax(baseUrl);
    java.setContent(h), h;
} else result;
</js>div.TxtContent@html||div#content@html##\"|\.

ruleSearch.author: dd.1@span.0@text##作者：##
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>su = source.getKey()
baseUrl = baseUrl.replace(/=$/, "")
if (/内容正在载入/.test(result)) {
    c2 = result.match(/c2="([^"]+)/)[1];
    url = result.match(/src="([^"]+)/)[1];
    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	try {
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
} catch(e) {result = ""} java.deleteFile(img)
}

result
</js>dl.B

searchUrl:
@js:url = source.getKey()
html = java.ajax(url)
act = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('form[name~=earch] input[name=act]').attr('value')

submit = java.encodeURI(/www/.test(url) ? "搜索 " : "快速搜书", 'gbk')
url += "/sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

re=java.post(url,body,{})
ck=re.header("Set-Cookie")
cookie.replaceCookie(url,ck)
rr=re.header("Location")
reurl=url+rr

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content##的小说
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter: .chapter-table a.0@text##正文.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字修Kk].*?[】）\)]
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content##\-.*|\_.*|\s.*

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

标签名::https://api.lofter.com/oldapi/tagPosts.api?product=lofter-android-6.13.0&method=newTagSearch&offset={{(page-1) *22}}&limit=22&firstpermalink=null&tag=标签名&type=new,{"method": "POST","body":"null"}

ruleBookInfo.author: $.response.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.response.posts[0].post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header))
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.response.collection.name

ruleContent.content: content = java.getString("$..content"); imgs = eval(String(java.getString("$..photoLinks"))); video = "" if(/\.mp4/.test(baseUrl)){ video = "请点击章节链接观看视频\n视频链接："+baseUrl } img = ""; imgs?imgs.forEach(x=>{ x?img += "\n":"" }):"" result = content + "\n"+img + video;
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
try{
		id = java.getString("$..post.id");
		id2 = java.getString("$..post.blogId");
url ="https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/post/newSupportInfo?postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2+"&openFansVipPlan=0&vipFans=0"
	$  = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(url)));
	l = $.data.gainReturnGifts;
	ls = []
	l.forEach(x=>{
		url = "https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/myReturnGift?id="+x.id+"&postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2;
		ls.push(url)
		})
	result = ls
	}catch(e){
		}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
   wordCount: o('.blue:eq(1)').replace('字',''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookintro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
